tool_description: Thirukkural is a simple quotes service. The original Thirukkural is a collection of 1330 Tamil couplets that discuss various aspects of life. Visit https://getthirukural.appspot.com/#api
name: Thirukkural
title: Thirukkural

api_list.name: kural/{number}?appid={appid}&format={format}
api_list.description: Get Thirukkural. Valid {number} values: 1) integer between 1 to 1330 2) 'rnd' 3) 10-20 (range)

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: Valid values: 1) integer between 1 to 1330 2) rnd 3) 10-20 (range)
